text:
Yes,
We also faced same issue, since installation is done on portal Id we hit users api and fetch first user which solves issue for 90% of our customers.
hey there question! is it possible to rebuild this custom dashboard with one of the HS apis?
unfortunately no APIs for dashboards I am aware of, which causes me a lot of pain having a staging and prod environment
<@UD53A9UUR> <@UFBNA9K9A> V4 associations API docs are broken-ish, the URL param fields don't appear in the example
That’s actually how all the url params are in our docs, they are blank until you fill in a value in the paramaters “Parameter” section just below your screenshot
Hi everyone! Is it possible to integrate a non-HubSpot form (with traffic/cookie association) with HubSpot using the nodejs package? Forms API doesn't seem to be available there
I think there need to be some sample requests and responses show actual example values for all of the params so that 1) they all show up in the docs and 2) we know what goes in these fields.
It’s something we considered but decided against because of the “try it” feature where it’s impossible to know valid values for the HubSpot account you are making API call against
That said, it’s good feedback that we need to have real data in our docs. I’ll pass that along to the team who owns this portion
I appreciate that, <@UFBNA9K9A>. I ran into a similar issue where I wasn't sure what went into a field, described<https://HubSpotdev.slack.com/archives/C2YHAHB6K/p1641956016029100| over here>.

Hey <@U02CUFSCXHQ> following up here from the other thread, the idProperty is only really needed when you aren’t using the `hs_object_id` . Check out the last section in the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/understanding-the-crm|Understanding the CRM Page>
I appreciate that link! I missed that apparently.

No problem, its easy to find when you already know where it is :slightly_smiling_face: I’ll make a note to see if we can add some linking from the field definition in the reference docs to that section of the article

Hi there,
I'm having an error concerning first name and last name not being able to pass from our woocommerce registration form to the HubSpot contact info. HubSpot receives the data but cannot "understand" that the data and value as to pass the it's contact info. Anyone can help on this?
it would be a lot more helpful if it had some deliberately bogus values there, like the variable name, so at least when you copy and paste you don't get a totally empty bogus URL

Hello,
Are you guys aware of any API that i can use in my custom code to send an email to an email address that i fetched from inside a deal.
 
So my current code is fetching the email address of a certain contact from a deal, my next step is to trigger an email to this contact. Is it possible to pass this email address as a parameter to a certain api to trigger an email to this contact ?
